name: Company Hierarchy Visualization
description: Display parent-subsidiary relationships and organizational structures for enterprise accounts.

prd.problemStatement: Enterprise sales teams struggle to understand complex organizational structures when dealing with large corporations that have multiple subsidiaries, divisions, and regional offices, leading to missed opportunities and account conflicts.
goals: Prevent account conflicts by showing company ownership

successMetrics.target: 100% of enterprise accounts have hierarchy mapped

outOfScope: Automated hierarchy detection from external sources
Complex org chart with multiple relationship types

userStories: As an enterprise sales rep, I want to see company hierarchies so that I can understand the complete account structure
As a sales manager, I want to prevent duplicate accounts so that we avoid internal competition
dependencies: Company profile feature must be completed
